extendedInfo.description: Siobhan Muir, an erotic paranormal romance author, spins tales of vampires, werewolves, goblins, dragons, and so much more. This Weird, Wild, & Wicked App is the go-to mobile source for all things relating to Ms. Muir and her writing, with up-to-the-minute information so you can be the first to know.Keep up with news, tweets, new releases, and works-in-progress with Siobhan's official app. Be the first to see new covers of future titles, release dates, and conference news. Read and/or even participate in a variety of flashfiction challenges such as #ThursThreads, which she hosts. Meet exciting guest authors on her blog as they introduce you to new books and romance. Opportunities to win swag, books, and so much more await you, so download the Weird, Wild, & Wicked App from Siobhan Muir.
